00071    template <typename ArithmeticalDSS>
00072   class Adapter 
00073   {
00074     protected:
00078       ArithmeticalDSS* myDSS;
00079     public:
00083       virtual typename ArithmeticalDSS::Point firstLeaningPoint() const = 0;
00087       virtual typename ArithmeticalDSS::Point lastLeaningPoint() const = 0;
00088   };

00105   template <typename ArithmeticalDSS>
00106   class Adapter4ConvexPart : public Adapter<ArithmeticalDSS> 
00107   {
00108     public:
00113       Adapter4ConvexPart(ArithmeticalDSS& aDSS)
00114       {
00115         this->myDSS = &aDSS;
00116       }
00120       virtual typename ArithmeticalDSS::Point firstLeaningPoint() const 
00121       {
00122         return this->myDSS->getUf();
00123       }
00127       virtual typename ArithmeticalDSS::Point lastLeaningPoint() const
00128       {
00129         return this->myDSS->getUl();
00130       }
00131   };
00132 
00148   template <typename ArithmeticalDSS>
00149   class Adapter4ConcavePart : public Adapter<ArithmeticalDSS> 
00150   {
00151     public:
00156       Adapter4ConcavePart(ArithmeticalDSS& aDSS)
00157       {
00158         this->myDSS = &aDSS;
00159       }
00163       virtual typename ArithmeticalDSS::Point firstLeaningPoint() const 
00164       {
00165         return this->myDSS->getLf();
00166       }
00170       virtual typename ArithmeticalDSS::Point lastLeaningPoint() const
00171       {
00172         return this->myDSS->getLl();
00173       }
00174   };
